title: Launch of AI-Native Reinsurance Platform RIQ
description: IHC has recently unveiled RIQ in partnership with BlackRock and Lunate, a next-generation AI-native global reinsurance platform. This collaboration aims to target liabilities exceeding USD 10 billion and is backed by over USD 1 billion in equity.
example: Insurance companies and technology firms can collaborate with IHC to leverage RIQ's AI capabilities. For instance, an insurance company could integrate RIQ’s platform for enhanced risk assessment and pricing models, thereby improving their operational efficiency and customer offerings.
roadmap: Step 1: Identify potential insurance and technology partners.
Step 2: Formulate a partnership agreement outlining technology integration.
Step 3: Develop a pilot project to test RIQ's functionalities within existing operations.
Step 4: Analyze pilot outcomes and adjust strategies as needed.
Step 5: Roll out full integration and collaboration across the industry.
source_name: Ihc Delivers Significant Growth In H1 2025 With Aed 547 Billion Revenue And Aed 108 Billion Net Profit Driven By Strategic Investments And A High Performing Q2

title: Collaboration for Dirham-Backed Stablecoin
description: IHC is partnering with ADQ and First Abu Dhabi Bank to launch a UAE Dirham-backed stablecoin. This initiative aims to enhance digital payments and promote blockchain innovation.
example: Fintech companies can collaborate with IHC and its partners to utilize the stablecoin for facilitating transactions and providing innovative financing solutions. For example, a payment gateway can integrate the stablecoin to offer lower transaction fees, boosting user adoption.
roadmap: Step 1: Identify and reach out to fintech companies interested in blockchain solutions.
Step 2: Develop a partnership framework focusing on use cases for the stablecoin.
Step 3: Conduct technical assessments to enable seamless integration of the stablecoin.
Step 4: Launch pilot programs to test the stablecoin in real transactions.
Step 5: Scale the integration based on pilot feedback and market demand.
source_name: Ihc Delivers Significant Growth In H1 2025 With Aed 547 Billion Revenue And Aed 108 Billion Net Profit Driven By Strategic Investments And A High Performing Q2

title: Gridora Infrastructure Platform Collaboration
description: IHC, in collaboration with ADQ and Modon, has launched Gridora, a national infrastructure platform aimed at accelerating the delivery of strategic projects in the UAE.
example: Construction firms and engineering companies can partner with IHC to access infrastructure contracts and bidding opportunities under the Gridora initiative. This can enable them to expand their project portfolios in a burgeoning regional market.
roadmap: Step 1: Assess the sectors and companies eligible for participation in infrastructure projects.
Step 2: Initiate discussions with potential construction and engineering partners.
Step 3: Develop joint proposals for upcoming infrastructure projects under Gridora.
Step 4: Bid for contracts and manage project execution collaboratively.
Step 5: Analyze outcomes and optimize the collaborative framework for future projects.
source_name: Ihc Delivers Significant Growth In H1 2025 With Aed 547 Billion Revenue And Aed 108 Billion Net Profit Driven By Strategic Investments And A High Performing Q2
